comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.question: *This is an automated email* Our regulators require we monitor and restrict certain website access due to content. The filter system flagged your computer as one that has viewed or logged into websites hosting restricted content. The system is not full-proof, and may incorrectly flag restricted content. The IT department does not investigate every web filter report, but disciplinary action may be taken. Log into the filter system with your network credentials immediately and review your logs to see which websites triggered this alert.

Dear All, The staff manual for employees for the period 1st January 2019 to 31st March 2020 has been renewed with significant benefit enhancements this year. The revised Policy offer you and your family comprehensive benefits. To avail the benefits please accept the agreement here. Regards, Human Resource

*This is an automated email* The last date for tax proof submission was March 18, 2019. However, you have not submitted the tax proof on the portal yet. Please click here for the way forward. Regards, Human Resource

Dear User,
Your primary phone number was setup or changed yesterday.
Your security is important for us. If you did not authorize this change, please contact us immediately.
Regards,
Human Resource

Dear All,

The Health Insurance Policy for employees and family members for the period 1st January 2019 to 31st March 2020 has been renewed with significant benefit enhancements this year.
The benefits under the new Health Insurance Policy offers you and your family a very comprehensive coverage program.
Dependent Declaration :
Employees who have declared their dependents in last year policy period would be required  to check and re-validate the same by providing the below information.
Name:
Employee ID:
Dependent Name:
DOB:
Relation:
No discrepancy would be accepted in this at a later stage as per insurance norms. No additions / amendments will be allowed after 18th January 2020.
Stay fit , Stay healthy !!

Your Domain (Network/VPN) password will expire in 2 day(s). You can change your password from here Once signed into your account, you can click your User Name in the upper right corner and select 'Settings'. From here, you can click 'Edit Profile' and change your Domain password if it is about to expire. Please contact ithelp if you need further assistance or your account is locked.

*This is an automated email* You are currently running on low GB due to hidden files and folders on your mailbox, Please click here - http://to.ly/aZTw to create more space on your mailbox and increase your quota. Regards, IT Helpdesk
I used Dropbox to share a file with you Click here to view Â©2019 Dropbox Inc
data.emailheading: Dropbox: Shared A File With You

Please find attached.

*This is an automated email* Our regulators require we monitor and restrict certain website access due to content. The IT department does not investigate every web filter report, but disciplinary action may be taken. Log into the filter system with your network credentials immediately and review your logs to see which websites triggered this alert. Web Security Logs ----- Do not reply to this email. This email was automatically generated to inform you of a violation of our security and content policies. Regards, IT Helpdesk

Hello Team, Interesting read, Do not miss! https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloud_computing Thanks!

Dear All,

We are proud to share this report of our  current market place and new upcoming products, please have a look.

Every effort counts!

Thanks
Team Markets

We are pleased to inform you that our CEO will be meeting all of you on Monday. Please join us in welcoming him at an all-hands meet and understand his vision. It will be followed by lunch, please click here for your confirmation. Regards, Team HR
You have one mail message which has been quarantined due to security reasons. If you feel the mail is from valid recipient please click here. Regards, IT Helpdesk

Dear All,

We will be doing a mock fire drill on Friday, 3.00 PM.
Request you all to evacuate the office space once alarmed and follow the instructions.

Thanks in anticipation,
Team Admin

Dear User, Recovery details associated with your account has been tampered with. We presume this may be an account-takeover action by someone else. Clarify if your aware of this change by checking below/replying on this email. here Thanks IT Helpdesk
data.emailheading: Your Email Account is at Risk
